extendedInfo.description: A galaxy of news for real News junkies. Just a few click takes you to all over worlds local and national newspapers, magazines, blogs, journals etc. More than 5000 newspaper from around 150 countries. RSS Feed Manager tool to manage feed channels from different categories. A best destination for Blogs lovers and many more features.RSS Feed Manager Tool - RSS Feed Manager Tool to manage your RSS Feed. More than 100 of popular pre organized RSS feeds channels in different categories like World, Business & Finance, Science & Technology, Sports, Health & Medicine, Life & style,  Education etc. Apart from that you can add or manage your own channels by browsing.Newspapers and MagazinesEasy to use directory of thousands of local and international newspapers, magazines and websites. Coverage of around 150 countries newspaper's and magazine's websites.Most Popular BlogsBest destination for Blogs lovers. World's top 100 most Popular Blogs Sites in categories like Entertainment, Sports, Politics, Technology, Business etc.USA Local News PapersLinks to over 3,300 United States Newspapers. This covers all 50 state's for quick access to a variety of state specific facts and other useful informationLocal News (Breaking News)Latest top news from your country.Please write us if you have any suggestion:contact@motileplus.com

reviews.title: Good news source
reviews.comment: But the interface needs work. Better navigation would help.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where are the controls?
reviews.comment: Really?  We find a reference in the app to using the menu button, but on my G2 there is no way to influence the content or its presentation. If control exists for users, the app unusually well hides it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Bad BUT...
reviews.comment: The UI is lacking. In need of update. Its not that bad but I will not use this with so many other great options available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interface so-so
reviews.comment: Funny, tons of Turkish newspapers in Europe section but 0 Greek? Seriously?
reviews.author: Bill Apostole

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Wonderful app, nice interface. Must install for everyone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: A very good app for all the news readers ... get access to all the relevant news from one place ... a must install...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice app.. updates will be exciting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: World news at you fingertips
reviews.comment: Terrific job, Awesome App. Keep a tab on the market, read your favorite blog, keep abreast with the latest news on the go!!! Such apps make smart phones really smart :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: News Unlimited.....
reviews.comment: Very Neat and easy to use.....Excellent work..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wonderful app ...superb work ..all d news at ur fingertips ...excellent job ...keep it up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Work on it
reviews.comment: Its a great app but it needs a mobile format option that formats the sources to fit perfectly on the phone so we dont have zoom in or out
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NICE APPLICATION & USEFULL
reviews.comment: Easy to connect with world wide news and blogs olny with the help of single touch on screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good stuff on of the best
reviews.author: A Google User
